commonFields.label: Type
commonFields.description: How to choose: use 'standalone-noun' when the kanji can appear as a standalone word without okurigana. If it cannot stand alone but commonly appears as a verb stem (requires okurigana), use 'verb-stem'. Otherwise use 'compound-morpheme' for bound/on-yomi uses in compounds. Other values cover adjectives, particles, counters, etc.
